products.name: La Lagartija
products.description:
Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for
the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich
delicious flavor.

products.name: El Tigre
products.description:
Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has
bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little
bit of peanuts with caramel.

products.name: La Cucaracha
products.description:
Sweet and intense with a big amount of different
flavors. Caramel, grapes, strwaberry, you name it! Itâ€™s
great choice for warm summer days.
